name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle
description: THE COLLISION IS INEVITABLE! THE IMPACT WILL BE UNAVOIDABLE! Cross over between 4 different universes! Play as characters from the BlazBlue, Persona, Under Night In-Birth, and (for the first time ever in a fighting game), RWBY series!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 / i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon R7 250 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires a 16:9 resolution monitor for optimal performance.
